item.title: 【Unreleased/Unofficial (lossy)】MP3 - Ludacris - Greatest Hits (2021) - FAN MADE + BONUS DISC
item.description:
CD 1

01 What's Your Fantasy-feat Shawnna
02 Southern Hospitality
03 Area Codes-feat Nate Dogg
04 Rollout (My Business)
05 Move Bitch-feat Mystikal & I-20
06 Act A Fool
07 P-Poppin-feat Shawnna & Lil Fate
08 Stand Up-feat Shawnna
09 Blow It Out
10 Get Back-feat Dolla Boy
11 Blueberry Yum Yum-feat Sleepy Brown
12 The Potion
13 Pimpin' All Over The World-feat Bobby Valentino
14 Slap
15 Everybody Hates Chris
16 How Low
17 My Chick Bad-feat Nicki Minaj
18 Jingalin
19 Vices
20 Butter.Atl

CD 2 Special Edition Bonus Disc

01 Saturday (Oooh Oooh!)-feat Sleepy Brown
02 Welcome To Atlanta-with Jermaine Dupri
03 N.S.E.W.-with DTP, Shawnna, Tity Boi, I-20 & Lil Fate
04 Southern Fried Intro
05 Splash Waterfalls

07 Number One Spot
08 Georgia-with DTP, Field Mob & Jamie Foxx
09 DTP For Life-with DTP, I-20 & Lil Fate
10 That's My Shit-with DTP, Field Mob, Playaz Circle & Perfect Harmany
11 Money Maker-feat Pharrell Williams
12 Celebrity Chick-with DTP, Chingy, Small World & Steph Jones
13 What Them Girls Like-feat Chris Brown & Sean Garrett
14 One More Drink-feat T-Pain
15 Intro B.O.T.S.-feat Shawnna
16 Everybody Drunk-feat Lil Scrappy
17 Representin'-feat Kelly Rowland
18 Problems-feat Cee-Lo Green
19 Get Lit
20 Vitamin D-feat Ty Dolla $ign
